remarks.para: One may be inoperative (including multiple greenband indication) provided faulty indicator is not visible.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard over faulty stabilizer trim indicator ensuring indication is obscured: "STAB TRIM IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

warning.para: ENSURE THAT PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL FLIGHT CONTROL SURFACES.

numlitem.para: Hold the STAB TRIM ALTN switches on the control stand to the APL NOSE UP position until the stabilizer stops moving. Check that the operating stabilizer trim indicator reads 14.60 to 14.90 units of trim.
Hold the STAB TRIM ALTN switches to the APL NOSE DN position until the stabilizer stops moving. Check that the operating stabilizer trim indicator reads 0.10 to 0.40 units of trim.
Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
